typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as string
}
source(output(
		code as string,
		grouping as string,
		classification as string,
		specialization as string,
		definition as string,
		notes as string,
		year as integer,
		current_flag as integer,
		{effective date} as string,
		{deactivation date} as string,
		{last modified date} as string,
		{display name} as string,
		{right_effective date} as string,
		{right_deactivation date} as string,
		{right_last modified date} as string,
		{right_display name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 derive(sql_query = $sql_query,
		qc_id = $qc_id) ~> TestQuery
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as string,
		{Deactivation Date} as string,
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['test_loop_sql_out.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
